oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grandpa Jones and his Grandchildren in Tokyo - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of an AFRS appearance by Grandpa Jones and his Grandchildren including Ramona Jones and Mary Klick, with host Connie B. Gay and announcer Rusty Knight. Part of Connie B. Gay's March 1951 tour to Japan and Korea. Also features an announcement from Edward S. Stephenson, the Entertainment Director for Special Services GHQ.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Grandpa Jones; Ramona Jones; Mary Klick; Grandchildren
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grandpa Jones introduces Ramona Jones and Mary Klick -- Mockingbird Hill (Ramona Jones, Mary Klick) -- Connie B. Gay introduces Edward S. Stephenson -- Edward S. Stephenson announces itinerary for Grandpa Jones and his Grandchildren -- Connie B. Gay introduces Grandpa Jones -- Pliney Jane (Grandpa Jones and his Grandchildren) -- Grandpa Jones talks -- I'll Fly Away (Grandpa Jones and his Grandchildren) -- Grandpa Jones introduces Ramona Jones -- Listen To The Mockingbird (Ramona Jones) -- Grandpa Jones introduces Mary Klick -- Honky Tonkin' (Mary Klick, Grandpa Jones, Ramona Jones) -- Comedy routine (Grandpa Jones) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Rusty Knight)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Gay, Connie B. (Connie Barriot), 1914-1989; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jones, Ramona; Klick, Mary (Singer)
